name: Oracle Adapter
desc: Calculates and exposes given asset prices.

methods.name: refresh_prices
methods.desc: Refresh the prices of the given assets.

args.name: lp_assets
args.desc: The list of LP assets to refresh the prices of.

args.name: non_lp_assets
args.desc: The list of non-LP assets to refresh the prices of.

args.name: oracle_0
args.desc: The first oracle price source of the oracle adapter.

args.name: oracle_1
args.desc: The second price source of the oracle adapter.

args.name: lp_token_oracle
args.desc: The LP Token Oracle of the oracle adapter.
